tokens.name: Parallium / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:
**Rationale:**  
- **BUY/SELL PRESSURE:** Ratio (1.9) > 1.5 indicates strong buying; stable momentum suggests aggressive parameters.  
- **LIMIT ORDER:** Strong buying pressure overrides high volatility (65.1% price change), so enter at market (0%).  
- **TAKE PROFIT:** Low volume (<$3k) → +5%–+10% range; aggressive TP set at +10% to capitalize on liquidity.  
- **STOP LOSS:** High volatility (65.1% price change) → -15%–-25% range; conservative SL at -15% to balance risk.  
- **TIME FRAME:** High volatility dictates 30min–2h for quick exits.
